name: Ancient Frontier: Steel Shadows
description: Steel Shadows is a standalone RPG set in the epic universe of Ancient Frontier. Take command of a rag tag band of pirates and outlaws as you fight your way across the Frontier for treasure and glory. Delve into our latest turn based tactical RPG.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer (may not work on all 32 bit systems) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Must be able to display 1024x768 resolution or higher. Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: Ensure your Microsoft Visual C++ Libraries are up to date if you get runtime errors.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) Memory: 16 GB RAM Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: Ensure your Microsoft Visual C++ Libraries are up to date if you get runtime errors.
